#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int val(int x)
{
    int num = x;

    int sum = 0;
    while(num>0)
    {
        sum += num%10;
        num /= 10;
    }

    return (x%sum);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        cout<<val(n)<<endl;
    }
}
